full_summary:
### W6599-230190 - Retender: Defensive Tactics Fundamentals
#### Solicitation Number: WS3818463324

**Retender Announcement**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a retender for the provision of Defensive Tactics programs.

**Program Requirements**

DND requires a contractor to develop and deliver two (2) Defensive Tactics programs.

**Closing Date and Time**

The closing date and time for the tender is 20 June 2024 at 14:00 EDT. Please note that any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is open to businesses that have entered into one or more of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Delivery**
The programs will be delivered in the province of Ontario, except for the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Officer**

For more information, please contact Kat Nimuan, contracting officer from PSPC. Her contact details are as follows:

Email: [kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: N/A
Address and Contact Details: N/A

**Notice URL**

To download the tender documents, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at the following link:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19881549?extsite=MTk4ODE1NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that the tender documents can be downloaded free of charge. You will need to create an account on the Ariba Discovery website to access the documents.

**Amendments and Corrections**
Please note that this is a retender announcement. All previous amendments have been cancelled. For any clarification, please contact the above-mentioned contracting officer.  All responses will be answered in a timely manner. Since this is a retender announcement with a proposed contract end date none, all entries listed will once again be considered for contracting consideration.
